1day.description: used in top left 'Upcoming' list, when the event is 1 day in the future (see otherDays)

actionSpeakDesc.message: The reminder will be read aloud using this voice:
actionSpeakDesc.description: in edit area when asking for a relative time

am.description: displayed in 'timeFormat12' if not using 24 hours clock

bDatePickerTitle.description: added <u></u> - should have one letter between <u> and </u>

bMonthMeaning.description: Names of days/months, with first one being Ayyam-i-ha

browserActionTitle.description: Shown until the dynamic tip is created

browserMenuOpen.description: shown as menu item when right-clicking on the browser icon

btnJumpToTitle.message: Move forward or backward by this number of days

btnPlannerExportCsv.description: button - export to Comma Separated Value format for import in to Excel

btnReminderCancel.description: cancel changes and close the edit area

btnReminderEdit.description: shown next to each reminder. Click to edit the reminder.

btnReminderSave.description: Save the changes and close the edit area

btnReminderSaveNew.description: Save the changes as a new reminder and close the edit area. The original reminder is not affected.

btnReminderTest.description: show a sample of the reminder now

bYearInVahidNameAr.description: Arabic names of years in a Vahid, with leading ,

Chrome_WebStore.description: link to Webstore when running in Chrome

Chrome_WebStoreSupport.description: link to Webstore support link when running in Chrome

copied.description: short message that replaces sample format button text when button is clicked

currentFocus.description: in wheel, points to today, or whatever day is currently selected

customBuilderEcho.message: Results (for currently selected day - see Tips & Keys to change day)

customBuilderIntro.message:
Type the format into this box. (View Hints)
Click an 'Add' button in the Available Date Parts to insert at the current location.

customIntroClick.message: Click 'Copy' to copy formatted date to the clipboard.

customLoadLetters.message: Click to copy from a standard format:

customSelectForFrontPage.message: Tick box to show on {0} page.

Ended.description: Shown in the upcoming dates area

eventTime.description: show start time in Events listing

eventTimeHeading1.description: heading in Events listing (if not showing Holy Days)

eventTimeHeading2.description: heading in Events listing (if showing Holy Days)

evePartOfDay.description: show start time in Events listing

example2.message: {bMonthNamePri} {bDay} {dayStartedLower} at sunset (about {startingSunsetDesc}) on {frag1WeekdayLong}, {frag1MonthShort} {frag1Day} and {dayEndedLower} at sunset (about {endingSunsetDesc}) on {frag2WeekdayLong}, {frag2MonthShort} {frag2Day}.

exportCalendarDescription.message: Dates in the Badí' Calendar for {location}

exporterDateRange.message: <u>R</u>ange of dates to Export (based on currently selected year)

exporterFastEnd.description: when the fast ends at sunset

exporterFastStart.description: when the fast starts at sunrise

exporterItemDescDay.message: A day in the Badí' calendar.
exporterItemDescDay.description: Included as the description in every calendar entry

exporterItemDescFast.message: Times for the annual Bahá'í Fast.
exporterItemDescFast.description: Included as the description in every calendar entry

exporterItemDescGeneralTime.message: Gathering may start at any time on this Badí' day.
exporterItemDescGeneralTime.description: For when a Holy Day as a particular time

exporterItemDescShared.message: Sunrise or sunset times shown are for {location}. Generated using http://bit.ly/BadiChrome.
exporterItemDescShared.description: Be sure the URL is not translated!

exporterItemDescSpecialTime.description: For when a Holy Day as a particular time

exportIncludeAlert.message: Add an alert to each event (may not load into Google calendar)

exportIntro.message: Important! See this web page for information and cautions!
exportIntro.description: Be sure the URL remains in English, to find the webpage!

exportName.message: Title for Exported Calendar (may not be used)

exportNumToInclude.message: Number of calendar entries that will be created (approximately):

exportOption_AllDay.message: All-day' event from midnight (1 day long)

exportOption_Start.message: Event at designated observation time or usual meeting time

exportOption_SunriseToSunset.message: Event from sunrise to sunset (about 12 hours)

exportOption_Usual.message: Event at usual meeting time (see Events page)

exportQuickDesc.message: Export each set, then load them all into the same calendar!

exportQuickPick1Text.message: Display each Badí' day, along with Holy Days and Feast times. No alerts.

exportQuickPick2Text.message: Sunrise, with an alert just before it.

exportRangeFullRange.message: Export all calendar entries. (If not checked, only export a sample set.)

facebook.description: ALT for icon at bottom of page

formatIconToolTip.description: text when mouse is over the extension icon

future_Day.description: shown in the eve of the day

googlePlus.description: ALT for icon at bottom of page

iftttInfo.message: For details or to sign up, see IFTTT Maker Channel. The event will contain these fields: title, body, tag

includeFeasts.description: choosing what to include in the listing

includeHolyDays.description: choosing what to include in the listing

includeThese.description: choosing what to include in the listing

jumpTo.description: user can enter a day after/before currently selected day

keyToOpenInTab.description: Press Shift+(this letter) to open into a tab

locationError.message:
Unable to determine your current location.

The extension will use 6:30pm for sunset on every date.
locationError.description: If the system cannot determine the location, this is shown in an alert window.

mainPartOfDay.description: show start time in Events listing

nextRefreshAlarm.description: only shown in the debug console

nextYear.description: hold Shift and press right arrow key

nextYearTitle.message: Press Shift + Right Arrow to view the next Year

noLocationAvailable.description: If the system does not know the location of this computer.

noLocationName.description: If the internet is not available, to get the name of the current location.

noReminders.description: shown if there are no reminders

past_Day.description: shown after midnight of the day

pick_pageCustom.description: page tab name and page title

pick_pageReminders.description: page tab name and page title

planIncludeWhat.description: include day or evening or both?

planIncludeWhatDay.description: answer to planIncludeWhat - from midnight to sunset (frag2)

planIncludeWhatEve.description: answer to planIncludeWhat - from sunset to midnight (frag1)

plannerStartSunsetForLocation.description: title in results table - sunset at location

pm.description: displayed in 'timeFormat12' if not using 24 hours clock

prevYear.description: hold Shift and press left arrow key

rbDefLang_Local.description: put your language here, in your script

reminderAction_speak.description: in dropdown list, to choose to read the alert

reminderAction_zapier.description: in dropdown list, to choose to use Zapier

reminderDayOfMonth.message: On day {num} of the Badí' month

reminderShowAt.description: in front of time of day input

reminderTagline.description: shown on the bottom of each reminder popoup

reminderTestTagline.description: shown on the bottom of popoup when tested

reminderTimeInputStructure.description: in edit area when asking for a relative time

reminderTitle.description: displayed as the title of each reminder shown

reminderTriggerGroup_day.description: a group of triggers - feast, holy day, Badi day

reminderTriggerGroup_load.description: a group of triggers - for other types of events

reminderTriggerGroup_time.description: a group of triggers - sunset sunrise noon midnight

reminderTrigger_holyday.description: what this reminder is triggered on

shoghiExample.message: This is the weekday of {bWeekdayNamePri}, the day of {bDayNamePri}, of the month of {bMonthNamePri}, of the year {bYearInVahidNamePri}, of the {bVahidOrdinalName} {VahidLabelPri}, of the {bKullishayOrdinalName} {KullishayLabelPri}.

shortcutKeyTitle.message: Press this key combination to open the Calendar from anywhere in the browser.

suggestionsTitle.message: Please click here and submit any suggestions for how to improve this extension!

timeFormat12.description: used when use24HourClock is set to false

tips.description: hints of how to use the tool

tipsAboutText.message: Dates until 221 B.E. (2064 A.D.) are known. After that, updates may be neeed as astronomical observations improve. Please don't use this to finalize your plans more than 50 years in the future! See the website for more details.

tipsText.message:
Press PgUp/PgDn keys to select panels.
Press Right/Left arrow keys to change days.
Press / to switch before/after sunset.
Press Home to return to today!
Press Ctrl+Shift+A to change language.

title.description: The title of the extension. Shown in a number of locations.

titleDesc.message: Shows today's date in the Wondrous (Badí') calendar, the official calendar of the Bahá'í Faith.

Tonight.description: Shown in the upcoming dates area

upcomingTitle.message: Upcoming Feasts, Holy Days and other events

use24HourClock.description: use 'true' or 'false' to use 24 hour or 12 hour (am/pm) clock

zapierInfo.message: For details or to sign up, see Zapier Webhook. The Zap will contain these fields: title, body, tag, time

setupOptOutTitle.description: title for setup section about opting out of Google Analytics

setupOptOutPara.message: To help understand how this Web Extension is being used, statistics are recorded whenever you switch between pages or do other major actions. This is anonymous, and the associated reports can be viewed by Glen Little. If you wish to opt out and turn this off, you may check this box:
setupOptOutPara.description: explanation of opting out of Google Analytics

setupAboutPara.message:
This Web Extension is designed to provide current information about the Badí' calendar, local to where you are.

For more information, please click below on the 'Version' link, or any of the icons!

cal2ShowTimes.description: a check box on the calendar, asking whether sunrise and sunset times should be displayed. If they are not, the calendar is generic for any location.

cal2DarkerColors.description: a check box on the calendar. If checked, darker colors are used.

nextMonth.description: button to move to next month (gregorian or badi)

prevMonth.description: button to move to previous month (gregorian or badi)

customLoadDefaultToolTip.message: Format to show in the Chrome icon tooltip:

customLoadDefaultTopDay.message: Format to show at the top of most pages:

defaultFormat.description: in the list of formats at the bottom of of the 'Custom' page

standardFormats.description: in the list of formats at the bottom of of the 'Custom' page

customFormats.description: in the list of formats at the bottom of of the 'Custom' page
